name: Sea and Adventure
description: This is a hodgepodge game that includes platform jumping, strategy chess, and trade exploration, with significant innovation in both platform jumping and strategy chess gameplay. Of course, this game was originally designed to imitate Age of Discovery 2, but it wanted to incorporate various innovations during development. After various attempts and explorations, it has become what it is now. The gameplay of platform jumping challenges is very different from other jumping games on the market.
